responsePreview:
{
	"id": "egyptian-verbs-101",
	"title": {
		"arabic": "إتقان تصريف الأفعال المصرية",
		"english": "Mastering Egyptian Verb Conjugation",
		"transliteration": "Etqan Tasreef El Af3al El Masreya"
	},
	"level": "beginner",
	"description": {
		"english": "A comprehensive guide to the most challenging part of Arabic: Verb conjugation. Learn how to change verbs for past, present, and future tenses across all persons in the Egyptian dialect.",
		"arabic": "دليل شامل لأصعب جزء في العربي: تصريف الأفعال. اتعلم ازاي تغير الأفعال للماضي والحاضر والمستقبل مع كل الضماير باللهجة المصرية."
	},
	"learningObjectives": [
		"Understand the structure of the Present, Past, and Future tenses in Egyptian Arabic",
		"Conjugate regular verbs for all pronouns (I, You, He, She, We, They)",
		"Distinguish between masculine and feminine forms in conjugation",
		"Learn common irregular verbs like 'to go' and 'to eat'",
		"Form negative sentences using conjugated verbs"
	],
	"estimatedDuration": 60,
	"prerequisites"
